attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK, pensioners recieve the lowest pension in Europe. netherlands &italy pay 83%, portugal& Greece 80& Germany 65&, Belgium 60%, France and Spain 50% and Denmark 40.in 2001 at the laeken summit our Government signed an agreement to increase state pensions to 40%of the National average wage by 2007( Ireland has now honored this agreement)So far UK has not WHY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
